channel.title: .CLASS file modding?
channel.description:
Can you mod the .class files of a private sever???
I can view the files and change values but it doesn't work.I try to change how much money you get when you start from like 100k to 500k and it doesn't work.

item.title: .CLASS file modding?
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:335302”][quote author=T3arful link=topic=431698.msg3169889#msg3169889 date=1270342818]

Try decompiling them to .java then do it, then recompile again.

You could’ve moved the topic to help -_-
[/quote]
SilentCJ knows what he is doing; this kind of topic belongs in this section as it’s it is private server client hacking.

Even though de-compiling is much easier you could always use BCEL to edit bytecode.[/quote]
Ok, though OPs post seems to be asking for help, and your section rules state that help topics must be in the client help section. Besides, this has nothing to do with clients being as he’s asking how to edit “starter money”.

Read full topic

item.title: .CLASS file modding?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“T3arful, post:5, topic:335302”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=431698.msg3169220#msg3169220 date=1270295187]
Try decompiling them to .java then do it, then recompile again.
[/quote]
You could’ve moved the topic to help -_-[/quote]
SilentCJ knows what he is doing; this kind of topic belongs in this section as it’s it is private server client hacking.

Even though de-compiling is much easier you could always use BCEL to edit bytecode.

Read full topic

item.title: .CLASS file modding?
item.dc:creator: @Lanthus20 Lanthus20
item.description:
@Lanthus20 wrote:

you can use cavaj to decompile if your wondering. Search google for it. Only thing is you’ll have to go through and save every one, plus you won’t get the helpfull hints because if they’re hidden with // or /blah blah blah/ or whatever, they wouldn’t be compiled in the first place.

Read full topic
